org.opengrok.suggest.popular.impl.chronicle

Class ChronicleMapConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.suggest.popular.impl.chronicle.ChronicleMapConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ChronicleMapConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    ChronicleMap does not have the configuration stored in the file. Therefore, other means were necessary to remember the configuration.
